name: Cake Mix Gingerbread Men
author: Duncan Hines(R) Canada
summary: Use your magic to decorate these delicious little ginger guys, made from Duncan Hines Spice Cake Mix. Or start a family tradition by making Gingerbread Men with your children.
ingredients: 1 package Duncan Hines® Moist Deluxe® Spice Cake Mix
1 tub Duncan Hines® Creamy Home-Style Vanilla Icing
heavy weight storage or freezer bag
directions: Combine cake mix, flour, eggs, oil, molasses and ginger in large bowl (mixture will be soft)
Place dough on lightly floured surface, cover with waxed paper
Cut with gingerbread man cookie cutter
Place 3 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet
Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until edges start to brown
Snip just the tip of one corner off to allow for a small hole
Pipe the face and ruffles onto cookies
